Plot: Four friends lose themselves in a carefree South-East Asian holiday. Only three come back. Dave and Alice return home to their young family desperate for answers about Jeremy's mysterious ...
Title: Wish You Were Here
Actors: Felicity Price, Joel Edgerton, Teresa Palmer, Antony Starr
tomatoConsensus: Smart, slick, and thrilling, Wish You Were Here benefits from a compelling mystery at the center of its tightly wound plot, as well as strong performances from a cast that includes Joel Edgerton.
